name: Presenting Michael Smith - Inventor of a revolutionary regenerative technology (Regen AI - DeSci - Blockchain - Public good)
description: In this video, the speaker discusses his work with Algae Aquaculture Technologies and how he began to componentize the system to use as a template for a variety of waste streams and inputs. He compares the components to software objects and sees a similarity to artificial intelligence in their behavior. The speaker also discusses the use of biomass as a solar collector and the regeneration of soil through regenerative agriculture. He emphasizes the importance of building sustainable systems that revitalize communities and discusses the idea of a neural network connecting earth power large nodes for marketing and distribution. Finally, the speaker discusses the behavior of different components and the potential for using waste heat in the system.
